subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Timofey Mozgov, a 7-foot-1 center who played for B.C. Khimki, has signed a three-year, $9 million free-agent contract.
snippet: Timofey Mozgov, a 7-foot-1 center who played for B.C. Khimki, has signed a three-year, $9 million free-agent contract.
